alert.note: Alert for Benton; Franklin; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:59AM CST until February 27 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR CENTRAL BENTON...WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN...CRAWFORD...NORTHERN SEBASTIAN AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1259 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fairview to 3 miles northwest of Garfield to 2 miles east of Lowell to 3 miles west of Mountainburg, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Van Buren... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Alma... Pea Ridge... Barling... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lavaca... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
